title: panic: reflect: call of reflect.Value.Type on zero Value / bleve/mapping_document.go:274
body:
I have a JSON document with a null field value, and when doing an index update, there's a nil-related panic when bleve does some reflect.Value.Type invocation.  I'm using a default/standard mapping document.  bleve commit version is "38ee9be35".

One example problematic JSON doc is the following, with the ParentId field...

{
  "Type": "commit",
  "RepoName": "blevesearch/analysis-wizard",
  "Key": "blevesearch/analysis-wizard/544f2b4ccad990f94fc0d974fef668dcbad7933b",
  "Id": "544f2b4ccad990f94fc0d974fef668dcbad7933b",
  "URL": "https://github.com/blevesearch/analysis-wizard/commit/544f2b4ccad990f94fc0d974fef668dcbad7933b",
  "ParentId": null,
  "Author": "Marty Schoch marty.schoch@gmail.com",
  "AuthorDate": "Tue Sep 9 18:11:27 2014 -0400",
  "Commit": "Marty Schoch marty.schoch@gmail.com",
  "CommitDate": "Tue Sep 9 18:11:27 2014 -0400",
  "Message": "first commit"
}

The crashing goroutine stacktrace is...

goroutine 58 [running]:
reflect.Value.Type(0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0)
    /usr/local/go/src/reflect/value.go:1633 +0x8c
github.com/blevesearch/bleve.(_DocumentMapping).processProperty(0xc208197e40, 0x0, 0x0, 0xc211998dd0, 0x1, 0x1, 0x9b2c70, 0x0, 0x0, 0xc21cb2af60)
    /Users/steveyen/go/src/github.com/blevesearch/bleve/mapping_document.go:274 +0x2a8
github.com/blevesearch/bleve.(_DocumentMapping).walkDocument(0xc208197e40, 0x4861c0, 0xc21cb2aea0, 0xc2232c3458, 0x0, 0x0, 0x9b2c70, 0x0, 0x0, 0xc21cb2af60)
    /Users/steveyen/go/src/github.com/blevesearch/bleve/mapping_document.go:224 +0x6ce
github.com/blevesearch/bleve.(_IndexMapping).mapDocument(0xc208188870, 0xc222f80480, 0x4861c0, 0xc21cb2aea0, 0x0, 0x0)
    /Users/steveyen/go/src/github.com/blevesearch/bleve/mapping_index.go:351 +0x4ab
github.com/blevesearch/bleve.(_indexImpl).Batch(0xc208153b20, 0xc211998340, 0x0, 0x0)
    /Users/steveyen/go/src/github.com/blevesearch/bleve/index_impl.go:305 +0x899
